capabilities.title: Advanced materials for extreme environments
capabilities.description: From fusion reactors to deep space, we develop materials that perform where others fail.

applications.label: Applications
applications.spaceDesc: Propulsion systems, thermal protection, and structural components for satellites and launch vehicles.
applications.fusionDesc: Plasma-facing materials and components for ITER and next-generation fusion reactors.
applications.aerospaceDesc: High-temperature alloys and coatings for turbine engines and hypersonic vehicles.

about.label: About
about.title: Built by scientists.
about.description: Bimo Tech was founded by material scientists with decades of experience in advanced materials research. We bridge the gap between cutting-edge science and industrial applications.
about.location: Based in Wrocław, Poland. Working globally.

innovation.title: Advanced
innovation.subtitle: Materials
innovation.description: From refractory metals to high-entropy alloys, powering the future of space exploration and energy systems.

hero.label: Products & Materials
hero.title: We offer a wide range of materials and raw materials
hero.description: For many years, we have been manufacturing components and supplying materials used in aviation, energy, and the environment, including biomaterials, electronic, magnetic, optical, and photonic materials.
hero.industries: Our clients include companies in the aerospace, automotive, food, chemical, energy, medical, mining, fuel, packaging, and many other industries.

culture.label: Culture
culture.title: What drives us
culture.description: We're a team of 30+ scientists, engineers, and specialists united by a passion for pushing the boundaries of materials science.

values.title: Our Values
values.scientificRigorDesc: Every decision grounded in data and research. We don't guess, we measure.
values.qualityObsessionDesc: We never compromise on material integrity. 99.95% purity isn't good enough when 99.99% is possible.
values.collaborationDesc: The best solutions come from diverse perspectives. We work across disciplines and borders.
values.learningDesc: Materials science never stops evolving, neither do we. 20% time for personal research.

benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.researchDesc: 20% time for personal research projects. Access to state-of-the-art equipment and facilities.
benefits.growthDesc: Conference attendance, training programs, and pathways to leadership for those who want it.
benefits.impactDesc: Work on materials that will power fusion reactors and enable deep space exploration.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Bimo Tech Sp. z o.o. ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and shares your personal data in connection with our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Polish laws.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.content: The controller of your personal data is Bimo Tech Sp. z o.o., with its registered office at Francuska 11, 54-405 Wroclaw, Poland. You can contact us regarding data protection matters at info@bimotech.pl.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect personal data that you provide to us directly (e.g., when you contact us, request a quote, or apply for a job) and data collected automatically via cookies. This may include: contact information (name, email, phone, company), business details, and technical data (IP address, browser type).

purpose.title: 3. Purpose and Legal Basis
purpose.content: We process your data for the following purposes: (a) Performance of a contract or taking steps prior to entering into a contract (e.g., processing orders, RFQs) - Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR; (b) Legitimate interests (e.g., answering inquiries, marketing our services, website security) - Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR; (c) Legal obligations (e.g., tax and accounting) - Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., IT support, hosting, accounting) who process data on our behalf. We do not sell your personal data.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict processing, and port your data. You also have the right to object to processing based on legitimate interests. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

termsPage.title: General Terms and Conditions of Sale
termsPage.intro: These General Terms and Conditions of Sale ('GTC') apply to all sales and deliveries of goods and services by Bimo Tech Sp. z o.o. ('Seller') to business customers ('Buyer').

orders.title: 1. Orders and Contracts
orders.content: All orders must be placed in writing (email or via our platform). A contract is concluded only upon written confirmation of the order by the Seller. Our offers are non-binding unless explicitly stated otherwise.

delivery.title: 2. Delivery and Risk
delivery.content: Unless agreed otherwise, deliveries are made Ex Works (Incoterms 2020) from our facility in Wroclaw. The risk of accidental loss or damage to the goods passes to the Buyer upon handover to the carrier.

prices.title: 3. Prices and Payment
prices.content: Prices are net prices in EUR or PLN and do not include VAT or shipping costs. Payments are due within the timeframe specified on the invoice (typically 14 or 30 days). Late payments may incur statutory interest.

warranty.title: 4. Warranty and Liability
warranty.content: The Seller warrants that the goods meet the agreed specifications. Liability for defects is limited to the replacement of goods or refund of the purchase price. The Seller's aggregate liability is limited to the value of the order. Indirect or consequential damages are excluded.

law.title: 5. Governing Law
law.content: These GTC are governed by Polish law. The exclusive place of jurisdiction for all disputes is the court competent for the Seller's registered office.

impressum.title: About Company
impressum.isoTitle: INTEGRATED QUALITY AND ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM POLICY ACCORDING TO ISO 9001:2015 AND ISO 14001:2015
impressum.description: Bimo Tech Sp. z o.o. operates with passion and specializes in supplying materials, products, and services for industry, constantly meeting or exceeding customer expectations. Our history dates back to 1992 when we started as BIMO, and since 2013 we have been operating under the current name.
impressum.specialization: Since our inception, we have specialized in the production and distribution of materials, components, and devices for industry and science.
impressum.sectors: We provide solutions for the Big Science sector and the space industry.
impressum.quality: We manufacture materials, components, and devices that meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.
impressum.peopleTitle: Our greatest asset is our people
impressum.peopleDesc: The competence, commitment, and awareness of the importance of implemented projects by our team build customer trust. Thanks to our staff, we are able to meet the most demanding challenges.
impressum.servicesTitle: Comprehensive project implementation – from concept to commissioning
impressum.servicesDesc: We can translate scientific requirements into concrete engineering solutions. Our services include:
serviceList: Assembly, integration, and testing up to final commissioning.
impressum.environment: We ensure the highest quality of management and service, while minimizing our impact on the environment. We constantly develop our presence on the European market and improve ourselves to meet global quality and sustainable development standards in everything we do.
impressum.partner: Join our group of partners and see how we can help your company achieve success.
